mapper.insert: insert into game_event(gid, title, sign_up_time, game_start_time, road_map, rule) values (#{gid}, #{title}, #{sign_up_time}, #{game_start_time}, #{road_map}, #{rule})
mapper.select: select * from game_event where title like concat('%',#{title},'%') limit #{page} #{size}
select count(*) from game_event where title like concat('%',#{title},'%')
